snippet: Senator Harry Reid has engaged in the greatest consolidation of congressional power since Newt Gingrich led the House, unleashing a bitterness that may derail efforts to extend unemployment insurance.
abstract: Senate Majority Leader Harry Reid, with his strong-armed change to filibuster rule and iron-fished control of Senate floor, has engaged in the greatest consolidation of congressional power since Newt Gingrich led the House, unleashing a bitterness that may derail efforts to extend unemployment insurance.
lead_paragraph: Senator Harry Reid has engaged in the greatest consolidation of congressional power since Newt Gingrich led the House, unleashing a bitterness that may derail efforts to extend unemployment insurance.

headline.main: Reid’s Uncompromising Power Play in Senate Rankles Republicans
headline.print_headline: Reid’s Uncompromising Power Play in Senate Rankles Republicans
